original_text: And Mordecai told him of all that had happened unto him, and of the sum of the money that Haman had promised to pay to the king's treasuries for the Jews, to destroy them.
korean_text: 모르드개가 자기가 당한 모든 일과 하만이 유다인을 멸하려고 왕의 금고에 바치기로 한 은의 정확한 액수를 하닥에게 말하고

sentences.original_text: And Mordecai told him of all that had happened unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모르드개는 자기에게 일어난 모든 일을 그에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: and of the sum of the money that Haman had promised to pay
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하만이 지불하기로 약속한 돈의 총액을 말했다

sentences.original_text: to the king's treasuries for the Jews
